beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where Transcontinental Race breaks you. 3100 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone
beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 500
beats.narration: Mile 500. The Alps. Near-freezing temperatures, storms, major passes like Stelvio at 2.8 thousandm. Where cold, altitude, and early fatigue test resolve.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Predominantly paved roads, mandatory gravel parcours, variable surfaces

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 1 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 1200
beats.narration: Mile 1200. Second Quarter. Days 3-6 where most scratches happen. Mental deflation sets in. '18 hours behind leaders in 36 hours' reality.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Predominantly paved roads, mandatory gravel parcours, variable surfaces

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 2 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 2000
beats.narration: Mile 2000. The Balkans. 40C+ heat, rough roads, remote terrain. 'The heat and rugged roads' where the race becomes survival.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Predominantly paved roads, mandatory gravel parcours, variable surfaces

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 3 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).
